body_html: I still think all of you are nuts (meant to be funny) not to just use docker and just keep your local device driver updated. :-) That is how I do the performance testing, if you were curious. Total docker convert here and I fought it to the end.
body_text: I still think all of you are nuts (meant to be funny) not to just use docker and just keep your local device driver updated.  :-)  That is how I do the performance testing, if you were curious.  Total docker convert here and I fought it to the end.
body: I still think all of you are nuts (meant to be funny) not to just use docker and just keep your local device driver updated.  :-)  That is how I do the performance testing, if you were curious.  Total docker convert here and I fought it to the end.
